title: Contracts
searchPlaceholder: Search by title or contract number...
guidance: Select a preset to start investigating, or use filters to find specific contracts. Click any row to expand risk factors. Use the compare tool to analyze contracts side-by-side.

suspiciousMonopolies.label: Suspicious Monopolies
suspiciousMonopolies.description: Critical-risk single-bidder contracts — one vendor, no competition

decemberRush.label: December Rush
decemberRush.description: High-risk year-end contracts — budget dumps before fiscal close

priceManipulation.label: Price Manipulation
priceManipulation.description: Statistical price outliers — contracts priced far above sector norm

ghostCompanies.label: Ghost Companies
ghostCompanies.description: Direct awards to out-of-industry vendors — classic ghost company pattern

networkClusters.label: Network Clusters
networkClusters.description: Critical-risk network member contracts — coordinated vendor groups

splitContracts.label: Split Contracts
splitContracts.description: Threshold splitting — multiple same-day contracts to dodge oversight limits

mostAnomalous.label: Most Anomalous
mostAnomalous.description: Contracts furthest from statistical norms — highest Mahalanobis distance across all risk dimensions

recentCritical.label: Recent & Critical
recentCritical.description: 2024 critical-risk contracts — most recent suspicious activity

biggestDirectAwards.label: Biggest Direct Awards
biggestDirectAwards.description: Largest contracts bypassing competitive tender — highest value without competition

table.anomalyTooltip: Mahalanobis distance — how statistically unusual this contract is across all risk dimensions. Higher = more unusual.
